title: 'I have some gas left in the tank': At 37, Djokovic still has big tennis goals
description: Djokovic has had a rough start to 2025, but shown flashes of brilliance too. And he's aiming for that 100th tour win.
author: Simon Cambers

title: Zverev, Sabalenka win first matches at Madrid
description: Top seeds Alexander Zverev and Aryna Sabalenka scored comfortable victories in their opening matches at the Madrid Open on Friday.

title: Auger-Aliassime receives wild card into Estoril Challenger
description: Felix Auger-Aliassime has received a wild card into next week's Millennium Estoril Open, an ATP Challenger Tour 175 event in Portugal. "I'm happy to say that I've accepted a wild card at the Estoril Open, so I'll be seeing you all very soon on the courts there," the Canadian said in a social media video posted by the tournament.Felix Auger-Aliassime has a message for you üòçWe can‚Äôt wait to welcome him back in Portugal! pic.twitter.com/cToJ1buKUP‚Äî Millennium #EstorilOpen (@EstorilOpen) April 25, 2025 At No. 27 in the PIF ATP Live Rankings, Auger-Aliassime will travel to the clay-court event following a second-round exit in Madrid, where he was defending runner-up points. The 24-year-old boasts a 17-10 season record, according to the Infosys ATP Win-Loss Index. Auger-Aliassime triumphed in Adelaide and Montpellier. He also reached the Dubai final. Auger-Aliassime has not competed at ATP Challenger level since 2019. The Millennium Estoril Open runs from 27 April-4 May.[NEWSLETTER FORM]

title: What were the Mutua Madrid Open results?
description: The 2025 Mutua Madrid Open continued on Friday, when top seed Alexander Zverev began his campaign. Casper Ruud, Taylor Fritz and Ben Shelton were among those who advanced. View all the Madrid results from Friday below. title: Unlock the Perfect Slice Serve - Essential Tennis Podcast #415
description: The wide slice serve is a CRITICAL tool to have in your tool box. It pulls opponents out of position, opens the court up for you to hit into, exposes their usually weaker backhand side, and forces them to run twice as far for the next shot - if they even get it at all. Let‚Äôs take a deep dive into how YOU can develop this powerful weapon, step by step in this special episode of the Essential Tennis Podcast.
author: Essential Tennis LLC

title: 3 Djokovic Secrets To Winning More Matches - Essential Tennis Podcast #414
description: In this special episode of the Essential Tennis Podcast, you're going to learn the top 3 tactical secrets of Novak Djokovic that you can apply in your very next match. Use these tools to gain precision, consistency, and offense to make your opponents more uncomfortable, win more points, and win more matches.
author: Essential Tennis LLC

title: Raducanu out of Madrid Open after loss to Kostyuk
description: Emma Raducanu loses to Ukraine's Marta Kostyuk in the second round of the Madrid Open.

title: 'One of my favourite wins' - Norrie battles illness to beat Landaluce
description: Britain's Cameron Norrie describes his first-round victory at the Madrid Open as one of his favourite wins in his career after overcoming illness to defeat Martin Landaluce.

title: Madrid Open 2025 Day 3 Recap
description: Day three in Madrid brought the top seeds into the fray, and Sascha Zverev started his campaign for a third title in the Spanish capital with a ruthless 6-2, 6-2 dispatch of Roberto Bautista Agut. Thirteenth seed Arthur Fils wasn‚Äôt able to back up his recent form as he fell to Comesana, with the Argentine ‚Ä¶
author: Jonathan

title: Madrid Open 2025 Day 2 Recap
description: Carlos Alcaraz‚Äôs withdrawal due to an adductor injury stole headlines at the 2025 Mutua Madrid Open on Thursday, leaving the bottom half of the draw wide open as Kamil Majchrzak enters as a lucky loser.
